query.name: question-list
query.sql: SELECT q.id, q.title, q.create_date, q.short_description, coalesce(r.rating,0), (select count(*) from awa_answer AS a WHERE q.id = a.question_id), q.author_id, u.name, email.email FROM awa_question AS q INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON q.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_email AS email ON q.author_id = email.user_id LEFT JOIN awa_rating AS r ON r.for_entity_id = q.id AND r.for_entity_type = $entity_type[awa_question] ORDER BY q.create_date DESC

query.name: question-tag-list
query.comment: Get a list of questions filtered by a tag.
query.sql: SELECT q.id, q.title, q.create_date, q.short_description, coalesce(r.rating,0), (select count(*) from awa_answer AS a WHERE q.id = a.question_id), q.author_id, u.name, email.email FROM awa_question AS q INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON q.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_email AS email ON q.author_id = email.user_id INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = q.id AND e.entity_type = $entity_type[awa_question] AND e.tag_id = :tag LEFT JOIN awa_rating AS r ON r.for_entity_id = q.id AND r.for_entity_type = $entity_type[awa_question] ORDER BY q.create_date DESC
